long_description: Shimano SLX CN-HG74 10-speed chain balances weight with sturdiness for trail-ready performance. The super-narrow HG-X style chain is optimized for mountain biking, featuring plates that are tuned for front and rear shifts. Please note: the SLX CN-HG74 10-speed chain is directional and should be mounted according to included instructions.
short_description: Shimano SLX CN-HG74 10-speed chain balances weight with sturdiness for trail-ready performance.
